title: Failure to report receipts
context: [ยง440E-12] Failure to report receipts. Whenever any promoter holding a license to conduct, hold, or give mixed martial arts contests fails to timely submit a report of any contest or comply with the requirements of this chapter, or whenever the report is unsatisfactory to the director, the director at the licensee&rsquo;s expense, may examine or cause to be examined, the books and records of the promoter. [L 2007, c 279, pt of ยง1]
